welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Centereach, a charming city known for its picturesque parks and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that Centereach has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves all domestic flights and includes a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves all international flights and includes a variety of amenities for international travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport is exclusively for private flights and offers additional amenities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suffolk County Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, duty-free shopping, and comfortable seating areas.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, the airport offers a separate terminal with luxurious amenities and personalized services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Haven Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New Haven Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
